name: FROM LUST CON AMOR - Alpha Version
name_original: FROM LUST CON AMOR - Alpha Version
description:
Written by Exal

Written by Exal

Visuals and Game creation by Jason Pratt

Game Synopsis: 

For Eddie's birthday, his best friend and long time crush, Andy gave him an ancient Mayan relic... which happens to be possessed.   Eddie then must choose to save his friend Andy from the demon,  all the while trying to keep the lives of Javier the playboy roommate, and Lisa, Andy's long term girlfriend, safe from the demons seductive power. The game is heavy inspired by David Cronenberg, and some good old fashion body horror mixed with Boy Love (Yaoi).  It's a romance with a bite.  

Explicit Content Warning: The Visual Novel has explicit sexual content as well as violence, body horror, and fun.    

Build Notes:

This is the alpha build,the game is fully functional. Though some of the writing might still be tweeked, there is no music or sound effect yet.  I'm also going to build a custom intro screen, buttons, and menus.  

Game Notes: 

Word Count just above 12,000 words.

2 main character routes.

6 endings.
